tool.name: IonMobilityBinning
tool.description: Splits an mzML file with IonMobility frames into multiple mzML files by binning(merging) spectra by their IM values
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && cp '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && mkdir out &&
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' -out out/
## Postprocessing #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.label: Input file (containing RT, IM, m/z
param.help: i.e. IM-frames) select mzml data sets(s)

param.label: Number of ion mobility bins to split the input file into
Absolute extension of the bin in IM dimension (causes bins to overlap by 2x this value)

section.name: SpectraMerging
section.title: Options for merging spectra within the same IM bin (from the same IM-frame)

param.name: mz_binning_width_unit
param.label: Unit of the m/z bin width
Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Splits an mzML file with IonMobility frames into multiple mzML files by binning(merging) spectra by their IM values
For more information, visit https://openms.de/doxygen/release/3.2.0/html/TOPP_IonMobilityBinning.html
